name: Frog Tales
description:
Frog Tales is a small 3D puzzle game in a dreamy world of frogs !

Manage your tadpoles and frogs to complete puzzles and bring them to the finish circle !

Make them eat and evolve as they gain new abilities to help them maneuver through the environnement.

This game is in early developement and was made in a week for the Brackeys-9 game jam. We are aware of some bugs and missing elements for this build, we're sorry for the inconveniences.
